title: Let's Make a Deal - 2 Doors Remain
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Let's Make a Deal - 2 Doors Remain
posts.post_content:
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sukLelCwdeY[/url]

Lets Make a Deal - of course

Pick Door #1 and you will get "Honest John" Anderson SGC 50 for $50.00 shipped.
"Honest John" is not as fuzzy as he appears in this scan, honestly.;)

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/18494/anderson[/IMG]

Pick Door #2  "Moose" McCormick PSA 3 has been SOLD as part of the Super Bowl Special.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10472/mccormick[/IMG]

Pick Door #3 and you get Al Bridwell with a cap SGC 60 for $80 shipped.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/18395/bridwell-with-cap[/IMG]

Or knock the whole damn house down and take all three for $160.:eek:

Any no fee payment will do.  A regular PP surcharge will be added if you wish.

Commit to buy one or more of these cards today before the Super Bowl kickoff and pick the winner of the Super Bowl in your post.  If your team wins, you will receive a 10% discount.  That means you could get all three cards for $144.

But Frank, all three doors are Carol Merril "winners."  You need to add a door with Jay Stewart riding the donkey !!!!!!!!!!!!! :)



........... man, I'm getting old.
Give me McCormick and I'll take the Seahawks for the discount!!!
What if Monte Hall had a Mantle Ball behind a Metal Wall?
